trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 29th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: photo evidence only over major urban fire
divs: sighting detailswhile standing on a bluff in the porter ranch section of the san fernando valley of los angeles at about 1300, i photographed a branch of a major fire. the digital photos covered a section of the san fernando valley\santa clarita pass area, which remained on fire and had significant smoke above it. shortly thereafter, while viewing the downloaded files on my computer, i noticed a speck in the sky portion on one photo. i zoomed in on the speck and found a "saucer" shaped item in the sky. i cannot determine the nature of the object represented by that speck, which appears to be "saucer shaped". it had no tail, no rotor. i did not notice or see this apparition when viewing the scene through my camera.
